root: ^It seems like you were the detective assigned to my case.

what: ^I'm the ghost of the man you are investigating, Harold Park.
ghost2: ^Yes, a ghost. I've returned after death to assist in my murder investigation.
who: ^Yes, I am Harold. I've returned after death to assist in my murder investigation.
killer: ^Well, that makes my job a lot easier. Who killed you?
killer2: ^Weirdly, I don't remember anything from that night, but I can help you by sending you back in time.
